meanings.definition: A boat used to transport passengers and vehicles across a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The ferryboats carried cars and people across the river.
meanings.sent2: We took the ferryboats to reach the island.
meanings.sent3: The ferryboats had a party atmosphere with music and dancing onboard.
meanings.sent4: The ferryboats were like floating bridges connecting the two shores.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the ferryboats gliding through the water was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: To transport passengers or vehicles by boat across a body of water.
meanings.sent1: They ferryboats passengers to the other side of the lake.
meanings.sent2: The captain ferryboats people across the bay every day.
meanings.sent3: I ferryboats my friends across the pond for fun.
meanings.sent4: She ferryboats her team to the competition in style.
meanings.sent5: Ferryboating tourists around the harbor is a relaxing job.
